summary: A group of Confederate soldiers hole up in an abandoned plantation after robbing a bank and find themselves at the mercy of supernatural forces.
cast: Henry Thomas|Patrick Fugit|Nicki Aycox|Michael Shannon|Muse Watson|Mark Boone Junior|Isaiah Washington|Harris Mann|Melanie Abramoff|Donna Biscoe|Brian Bremer|Russell Durham Comegys|David Dwyer|Michael Faella|Steve Green|Douglas M. Griffin|Drew Hall|Evan Hipps|Sydney Jones|Terry Jones|Danny Kamin|Mikal Kartvedt|Ted Manson|Ken McGhee|Michael Purnell|Sam Rhymes|Bret Roberts|Terrie Thompson|Sam Breslin Wright|Allan B. Holt|Robbie
title: Gritos de muerte
